page.title: 06Employment and Mobility 3
page.content: Approximately 81% come from outside the area from as far north as Newcastle and Aberdeen, to as far south as Barnstable in Devon. Further south we have a family from the Natal in South Africa and further east we have a family from Holland.A number of reasons were given to suggest why families have moved to our village ranging from :closer to work, buying a bigger house, wanting to live in the country, marriage, wanting to return to England.Reasons for possible moves away were similar with :to find new job, buy a bigger house, cost to get to work and job, medical reasons, and wanting to live more in the country.
